body:

comments_content.body:
The warnings would always have been there.
The errors come from the fact that the images are not updated in dvc, but I have no control over that, unless I get initiated on how this works.
Maybe @meghanrjones can do that.
In any case, those images may need some further reworking given the new color maps that have been added.

I am very low on time until Saturday. If you let me know what part of https://docs.generic-mapping-tools.org/dev/devdocs/contributing.html#managing-test-images-using-data-version-control-dvc you got stuck on, I could offer tips and improve the instructions for next time.
I should be able to do this today.

title: The CPT gallery images "GMT_App_M_*.sh" fail
